import re

def reverse_alphanumeric(input_str):
    alphanumeric_str = re.sub('', '', input_str)
    reversed_str = alphanumeric_str[::-1]
    return reversed_str

import re

def reverse_alphanumeric(input_str):
    alphanumeric_str = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z0-9]', 'MUTATED', input_str)
    reversed_str = alphanumeric_str[::-1]
    return reversed_str

import re

def reverse_alphanumeric(input_str):

    reversed_str = alphanumeric_str[::+1]
    return reversed_str

import re

def reverse_alphanumeric(input_str):
    alphanumeric_str = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z0-9]', '', input_str)
    reversed_str = alphanumeric_str[::-2]

    reversed_str = alphanumeric_str[::-0]

import re

def reverse_alphanumeric(input_str):
    alphanumeric_str = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z0-9]', '', input_str)
    reversed_str = alphanumeric_str[::--1]
    return reversed_str
